author: Omkar Godbole
title: Elon Musk Announces 'Bitcoin-Style' XChat, But Tech Experts Are Skeptical
description: Tech experts question the new offering's claims of having Bitcoin-style encryption.
content: Tech billionaire Elon Musk, the boss of X (formerly Twitter), Tesla, and SpaceX, announced on Sunday the launch of a brand-new messaging app called XChat. Neither the BTC market nor the tech communit… [+1458 chars]
